description: Physicists solve a puzzle linked to JWST-ER1g, a massive ancient galaxy that formed when the universe was just a quarter of its current age.
title: Physicists solve puzzle about ancient galaxy found by Webb telescope

description: Researchers have developed a way to use radar to detect open water zones and other changes in Alaska's frozen rivers in the early winter. The approach can be automated to provide current hazard maps and is applicable across the Arctic and sub-Arctic.
title: New radar analysis method can improve winter river safety

description: Managing problematic student behavior is one of the most persistent, challenging, and controversial issues facing schools today. Yet despite best intentions to build a more inclusive and punitive-free education system, school suspensions and expulsions remain.
title: School suspensions and exclusions put vulnerable children at risk

description: Innovative carbon beads reduce bad bacteria and inflammation in animal models, which are linked to liver cirrhosis and other serious health issues.
title: Carbon beads help restore healthy gut microbiome and reduce liver disease progression
